Articles.Content:
When attaching anything to the bottom of an LV-N "Nerv" engine, the attachment point start to blink on and off making it quite difficult to place parts.

I have a number of mods, including both Restock and Kerbal Atomics (both of which modify the LV-N) however the game behaves the same with these modules disabled.  Would be interested to see if someone else can repo this issue with a very simple build:     RC-001S Remote Guidance Unit, Mk1 Liquid Fuel Fuselage, LV-N "Nerv" Atomic Rocket Motor, TD-12 Decoupler, C7 Brand Adapter - 2.5m to 1.25m.  After that anything I try and attach gets the blinking attachment point.
